You can load the data directly from the UCI Machine Learning repository. you can download the iris.csv file into your working directory and load it using the same method, changing URL to the local file name.

 Correlation is used to determine pairwise correlation of all the columns of the dataset.
 The missing values are excluded and non-numeric columns are also ignored.
